name: Sleepy Chicken Sexer
description:
It's your first day as a Chicken Sexer, and you're falling asleep!

Use the MOUSE to move your hands.

Use SPACE_KEY to pick up objets in the scene.

Put chickens into their matching baskets to get points and coffee.

Do not fall asleep!! XD

===========================

UPDATES:

v.1.0.1:

  • Snoring graphic bug solved.
  • Objects grabbing issue solved: objects are not deleted if grabbed, while passing over convoy doors. 

===========================
